meta_data.title: About BunkerDigital | Expert web design and digital strategy
meta_data.description: BunkerDigital is led by developer and digital marketer Paul McKenna. I design and build high performance websites and run effective digital campaigns for businesses that want results without agency complexity.

hero_service.headline: Expert web design and digital strategy for small businesses
hero_service.subheadline: From website design to Google Ads and SEO, we help small and service-based companies attract more customers and look more professional online.

text_image_section.title: A developer and marketer who understands how to grow real businesses

content.text: BunkerDigital was created to give businesses an alternative to slow, overpriced and outdated digital agencies. My background combines two areas that are rarely offered by the same person.

I have more than 13 years of hands on experience running digital marketing campaigns, and 9 years of experience building modern, high performance websites using frameworks such as Next.js and Astro. That means I can design, build and optimise sites with a direct focus on leads and revenue, not just surface level design.

Every project is managed by me. There are no layers of account managers and no confusion about who is doing the work. You speak directly to the person who is responsible for the strategy, the code and the results.

I am based in Hazel Grove, Stockport, but I work with clients across the UK. Many projects are run entirely online using calls and screen sharing, with in person visits when they add value. I am happy to work with businesses of all sizes, from one-person startups to established companies.

overview_intro.heading: A developer and marketer who understands how to grow real businesses

content.text: BunkerDigital is intentionally small so that communication stays clear and projects move quickly. At the same time, the work is grounded in modern technology, strong performance and proven marketing practice. You get a personal, long term relationship with someone who understands your business, plus access to designers, copywriters, photographers and other specialists when the project needs them.

Websites are built to load fast, score highly on Google PageSpeed and provide a solid foundation for search. Campaigns are set up with clean tracking so you can see which channels are actually delivering enquiries. When extra capacity or specialist skills are needed, I work with a trusted network of freelancers instead of carrying a large fixed team. Competitive pricing makes high quality work accessible to small and local businesses.
Guaranteed 90 plus scores on all PageSpeed Insight metrics for new builds
SEO ready sites with structured data, clean metadata, sitemaps and open graph images
Modern tech stack such as Next.js, Astro, Storyblok and Contentful rather than outdated platforms
Track record of website transformations and successful Google Ads and Bing Ads campaigns
Competitive pricing that makes high quality work accessible to small and local businesses
You get a personal, long term relationship with someone who understands your business, plus access to designers, copywriters, photographers and other specialists when the project needs them.

icon_grid.description: Sites are built for speed, stability and high PageSpeed scores, not as an afterthought.

faq_container.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq_container.subheading: A few common questions about how we work and what to expect when you work with BunkerDigital.

questions.question: Do you only work with businesses in Manchester or the UK
questions.answer: No. I am based in Hazel Grove, Stockport, but I work with clients across the UK. Many projects are run entirely online using calls and screen sharing, with in person visits when they add value.

questions.question: What types of businesses do you work with
questions.answer: Most of my clients are small and growing businesses, trades, local services, charities and professional firms. The common thread is that they want a modern, reliable digital setup and a clear point of contact. I am happy to work with businesses of all sizes, from one-person startups to established companies.

questions.question: Do you only build new websites
questions.answer: I regularly redesign and rebuild existing sites, especially when they are slow, hard to update or difficult to integrate with marketing. In some cases a smaller improvement is enough, and I will always give an honest view. I am happy to work with businesses of all sizes, from one-person startups to established companies.

questions.question: Can you manage everything for us
questions.answer: Yes. I can handle the website, hosting, tracking, local SEO and paid ads as one joined up system. If you prefer to keep some parts in house, I am happy to work alongside your existing team or suppliers.

questions.question: How do projects typically start
questions.answer: Usually with a short call to understand your business, current setup and goals. From there I will outline a practical plan, a clear scope of work and pricing so you know exactly what is included before we begin.
